name: Project 1: Unity Solar System Model
description:
A moving model of all major celestial bodies within our solar systems (this includes Pluto), except for the moons of planets besides that of Earth. Not to scale to prevent it from breaking any computers but to scale in the way science fair solar system dioramas are. Includes the actual recordings of the sounds each planet makes, as "recorded" by Nasa and somewhat accurate orbits.  

Credits:

Game and desktop icon by dickie

Sounds of Planets from NASA, probably.
